Identification_Area.title: ULY JUP COSPIN LOW ENERGY TELESCOPE 32 SEC PARTICLE FLUX

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Marsden, R.G., T.R. Sanderson, A.M. Heras, and K.-P. Wenzel, Ulysses SEP Composition Measurements: First Results from the COSPIN LET Experiment, Proc. 22nd Int. Cosmic Ray Conf. (Dublin), 3, 335, 1991.

Simpson, J.A., J.D. Anglin, A. Balogh, M. Bercovitch, J.M. Bouman, E.E. Budzinski, J.R. Burrows, R. Carvell, J.J. Connell, R. Ducros, P. Ferrando, J. Firth, M. Garcia-Munoz, J. Henrion, R.J. Hynds, B. Iwers, R. Jacquet, H. Kunow, G. Lentz, R.G. Marsden, R.B. McKibben, R. Mueller-Mellin, D.E. Page, M. Perkins, A. Raviart, T.R. Sanderson, H. Sierks, L. Treguer, A.J. Tuzzolino, K.-P. Wenzel, and G. Wibberenz, The Ulysses cosmic ray and solar particle investigation, Astron. Astrophys. Suppl. Set: 92, 365-399, 1992.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: ULY JUP COSPIN LOW ENERGY TELESCOPE 32 SEC PARTICLE FLUX
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: ULY JUP COSPIN LOW ENERGY TELESCOPE 32 SEC PARTICLE FLUX
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains COSPIN Low Energy Telescope (LET) particle flux rates from the Ulysses Jupiter encounter 1992-Jan-25 to 1992-Feb-16.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set contains COSPIN Low Energy Telescope (LET) particle flux rates from the Ulysses Jupiter encounter 1992-Jan-25 to 1992-Feb-16.
COSPIN-LET RECORD FORMAT (REFERENCE: [SIMPSONETAL1992A] page 382, table 4)
UDS REPRESENTATIVE: T.R. SANDERSON (ESTCS1::TSANDERS)
Data ==== RECORD FORTRAN FORMAT:
implicit real(l) character*24 time read(1,'(a24,38(1x,1pe9.2))') time,l1,l2,l3, l4,l5,l6,l7,l8,l9,l10,l11, l12,l13,l14,l15,l16,l17,l18,l19,l20, l21,l22,l23,l24,l25,l26,l27,l28,l29, l30,l31,l32,l33,l34,l35,l36,l37,l38
PARAMETER LIST:
TIME: spacecraft event time in the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ L1: protons (0.9-1.2 MeV) L2: protons (1.2-3.0 MeV) L3: protons (1.8-3.8 MeV) L4_11: protons (1.8-3.8 MeV) sectors 1 to 8 L12: protons (3.8-8.0 MeV) L13_20: protons (3.8-8.0 MeV) sectors 1 to 8 L21: protons (8.0-19.0 MeV) L22: alphas (1.0-5.0 MeV) L23: alphas (1.9-3.7 MeV) L24: alphas (3.7-8.4 MeV) L25: alphas (8.4-19.0 MeV) L26 Li,Be,B (1.9-4.9 MeV) L27 Li,Be,B (4.9-26 MeV) L28 C,N,O (2.6-7.1 MeV) L29 C,N,O (7.1-39.0 MeV) L30 Z>=10 (3.0-9.0 MeV) L31 10<=Z<=20 (9.0-50 MeV) L32 Z>=20 (12.0-75.0 MeV) L33 electrons (0.3-1.0 MeV) L34_38 single detector counting rates
FLUX UNITS: (/cm^2/s/sr/MeV)
TIME RESOLUTION: 32 seconds
NOTES:
The response of the LET rate channels is affected by at least three different effects originating in the electronic circuits: dead-time effect; pulse pile-up; and baseline shift.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= None provided. For more information regarding the confidence level of this data set please contact:
